item.description:
Spend the first weekend in March at Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club

We plan to ski / ride on Saturday at Wildcat. Discount lift passes available to guests! Then afterwards, we will go to a super fun apres-ski event hosted at our house.


Details- Guest Fee  - Only $52 for the weekend. This is payable via PayPal when you RSVP Yes. No refunds.

  • Arrive Friday after dinner / work - 10PM
  • Ski, X-C Skii or Ride on Saturday
  • Apres-Ski events to folllow.
  • Head for home Sunday afternoon or  shop at North Conway's Tax-Free Outlets.

 

Accommoadations

- Rooms separated by gender

- Dorm style

- Bring your own bedding - Twin Sheets / blanket / pillow or Sleeping Bag and Pillow

- Bring your own toiletries. (Flip Flops for shower, Towel, Hair dryer, Soap, Shampoo)

- Since we are not a hotel, you will be expected to keep your own room clean and possibly help out with chores and cleaning up the club.

Gear

- Bring your winter gear (Skis, Snowboard, X-C Skis, Snowshoes)

Meals

- TBD - Details when you arrive.

Apres Ski events

- One will be held at the Wedeln club and is $12 - payable when you arrive. Another will occur later that evening.

Only a limited amount of spaces are available (Max 10). Reserve early and come up for the weekend.

Feel free to contact me if you have any questions, issues, or concerns.

Regards,

Mags
item.name: Happy March 1,2,3 Weekend at Wedeln Ski & Outdoors Club
